Title: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to increase clean energy distribution infrastructure
Summary: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to increase clean energy distribution infrastructure to allow the state to reach peak clean energy consumption and distribution goals.
LawCode: Add Art 8 Title 9-D §§1920 & 1921, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to increasing development of clean energy distribution infrastructure
